Class RenderPtObj

java.lang.Object
  anar.RenderP5

All Implemented Interfaces:
Render
public class RenderPtObj
extends RenderPt

Render a point with the given Obj. Usefull to create 3d Points representations. (like using a cube or a sphere to display points).
